00000000000000000000000000000000 --0: no op start
01011000000000000000000000000000 --1: pchk p0
10010100000000000000000000001001 --2: brnp r0, 9
00000000000000000000000000000000 --3: no op
00000000000000000000000000000000 --4: no op
01010100000000000000000000000000 --5: pin0 p0
10011000000000000000000000000001 --6: jp r0, 1
00000000000000000000000000000000 --7: no op
00000000000000000000000000000000 --8: no op
01010000000000000000000000000000 --9: pin1 p0
10011000000000000000000000000001 --a: jp r0, 1
%

Pin Test

A simple program that tests if input pin 0 is
1 or 0, and sets output pin 0 accordingly
